name: Ting
overview:
Ting is an MVNO in the US, operating on the Sprint Network. Ting’s model is to provide flexibility in prepaid billing by allowing for the separation of the three services provided - minutes, SMS and data.

Users pay in advance for what they estimate they will use across the three categories. The following month, they are either credited if they didn’t use as much as they thought, or are bumped up to the next plan size if they did.

Ting promises excellent customer support, including a no-wait phone policy which promises to have a live person answer the phone and stick with the customer until the problem is solved.

Ting is a part of Tucows, whose other business lines include domain registrar Hover, and wholesale services provider OpenSRS.
